boardgame.name: Trickerion: Legends of Illusion
Trickerion: Meister der Magie
트릭케리언
boardgame.description: Trickerion is a competitive Euro-style strategy game set in a fictional world inspired by the late 19th century urban life and culture, spiced with a pinch of supernatural._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players take on the roles of rival stage illusionists, each with their own strengths and characteristics. They are striving for fortune and fame in a competition hosted by a legendary magician, looking for a successor worthy of the mighty Trickerion Stone, which is fabled to grant supernatural power to its owner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using worker placement and simultaneous action selection mechanisms, the Illusionists and their teams of helpers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; the Engineer, the Assistant, the Manager, and a handful of Apprentices _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; obtain blueprints and components for increasingly complex magic tricks, expand the team and set up performances by visiting the Downtown, Dark Alley, Market Row and Theater locations on the main game board depicting a late 19th century cityscape._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The tricks are stored and prepared on the Magician's own Workshop game board, while the performances themselves take place at the Theater in the form of a tile placement mini-game with lots of player interaction. The performances yield Fame points and Coins to their owners based on the tricks they consist of. Fame points have multiple uses, but they also serve as a win condition - After turn 7, when the last Performance card is revealed, the game ends and the illusionist with the most Fame points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game offers 48 different Tricks to be learned from the Optical, Spiritual, Mechanical and Escape categories, over 90 character abilities, and 40 Special Assignment cards that influence the actions taken at the various game locations. The base game can be expanded with two optional rule modules to add further strategic depth to the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dark Alley_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; expansion included in the base game adds a new location to the game. It also comes with 48 new Special Assignment cards, a new tier of Tricks, and 27 Prophecy tokens that can alter certain game rules turn by turn, giving the game additional variety._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Kickstarter Limited LEGEND BOX Edition with all stretch rewards and expansion (some rewards are KS exclusive)! Brand new, in Original seal and unplayed. Expect to receive this late November / first week of December. I ship worldwide, but PLEASE contact me before purchasing if you want to know the shipping costs. Shipping costs within Netherlands ONLY: 7 met TNT Pakketpost 6 met DHL thuisbezorgd 5 met DHL afhaalpunt Afhalen is mogelijk in Dordrecht/Rotterdam/Rijswijk op afspraak. My preffered option of payment would be by bank or cash with pick-up. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t use PayPal after being scammed a couple of times. I will only allow payment by PayPal as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;sending money to friend/family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; If you have any other questions, please contact me.

Kickstarter Edition, Expansion included (Legend Box). Comes with extra german card deck. Everything still in shrink. Shipping: Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Regular shipping with DHL: ---------------------------------------- Up to 1kg without insurance (e.g. small cardgames): Germany: EUR 2,20 (Höhe bis 5 cm, sonst EUR 3,90) Europe/World: EUR 7,00 Up to 2kg without insurance: Germany: EUR 4,10 EU: EUR 8,60 World: EUR 13,90 (length + width + depth = max. 90 cm) Up to 5 kg with tracking _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; limited insurance Germany: EUR 7,00 EU: EUR 16,00 Rest of Europe: 29,00 US/Canada: EUR 35,00 Rest of the world: EUR 39,- Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (IBAN/BIC). Outside EU PayPal and bank-transfer (IBAN/BIC) are possible.

Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com

PLEASE NOTE: This includes the complete expansion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Dahlgaard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gifts!!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; This copy of Trickerion (and the expansion Dahlgaard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gifts) was purchased new on Kickstarter as an add-on during the Anachrony kickstarter campaign. As with almost all my games, I immediately sleeved all cards prior to playing, and all cards remain sleeved. This also includes the Meeple Realty _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Trickerion Theater_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; aftermarket box insert: https://www.meeplerealty.com/product/trickerion-theater/ As you can see from the pictures, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a wonderful insert and makes game setup/put-away much easier. That said, it was a HUGE effort to put together (easily a 4 - 5 hour job because I sanded down all the rough edges and filed down the break-tabs). Used tiny amounts of superglue where necessary to make sure it holds together firmly. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve only played the game a few times and it remains in perfect condition. As stated, all cards are sleeved and there are no missing components. Buyer will be responsible for postage. Postage will be approximated at USPS website. I will do my best to keep shipping costs low (I have no intention of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;making money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; off the shipping). I cannot make promises for the post office, but I will pack everything as best I can to avoid any damage to the components in transit. If you have any questions, please feel free to geekmail.

Smoke free pet friendly home, pleas geekmail any questions, cheers!
